attributes.action: Offer EU Citizens established in the UK Associate British Citizenship
attributes.additional_details:
It is abhorrent the British government proposes to use EU citizens in the UK as bargaining chips when we need the goodwill of partners in the EU and given their contribution over decades, through work, business, scientific discovery, and raising families. Offering the same rights would encourage EU member countries to reciprocate.
http://www.euractiv.com/section/uk-europe/interview/charles-goerens-associate-citizenship-for-brits-is-an-offer-not-an-obligation/
attributes.background: A proposal exists from members of the European Parliament to offer Britons who want it associate European citizenship. The UK should reciprocate by offering EU citizens already established permanent residence or associate British citizenship, without strings, immediately.

rejection.details:
We're not sure what you mean by "associate citizenship". You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/161493
